title: Ep. 26 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: In this episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave, Bert Kreischer decides he's going to try to listen. Does he succeed? Tom Segura tells him about getting blacked out, playing football, and getting into stand-up. Bert shares stories about browning in his pants. Tom then calls Dr. Drew and asks about Bert's health. Tom and Bert wrap up by sharing what they learned about each other this episode. When was the last time YOU browned in your pants? Let us know in the comment section below!
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
